name: Symmetrain
description:
* Winner of the IGF 2014 Student Showcase *

Symmetrain, high score chase in symmetry!

Choose your train and spot all differences as quickly as you can while driving from train station to train station. But be aware, every mistake delays your train until it disappears out of view. Don't let this happen! Use the emergency brake in tricky passages and bring all passengers safely to the next train station.

Challenge your friends and show them who has the best reaction and highest high score while mastering faster trains in different landscapes!

++ Pocketgamer.co.uk quote ++
“It's an ingenious concept, and it works well in practice. The controls are simple and responsive, and the whole thing is lifted by some excellent, picturebook-style hand-drawn artwork.”

- Eight trains to unlock and play. each with a different speed, look and travel route.

- Dynamic generated game play – every challenge is a new challenge!

- A game for everyone – easy trains for beginners and children, faster and more difficult trains as you improve.

- A picturesque world full of lovely hand-drawn graphics

- A smooth guitar soundtrack that you will not forget

- Game Center integration and iCloud synchronization - compete against your friends for the ultimate highscore!
